fr.upem.jeu.hanabi.game

Class HandPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upem.jeu.hanabi.game.HandPlayer

  • public class HandPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which represent the identity of a player and the content of his hand. You can decide with this class which action will the player execute on his hand.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Axel DURAND

        id - id of the player
        hand - cards which will be in the hand of a player
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the id of a player if inferior to 1or hand of a player is empty at the creation.
